title: Permantley banned post
body:
So I've just recently been perma banned and I'm wondering why I can still post on boards and upvote. What is the point in permanently banning an account from playing games but nothing else?
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body:
It's mainly so that people who have been banned can still come here to talk about their ban, or seek help if they wish to make a new account and reform. 

As long as you don't break any of [our rules](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/BjArMH2B-boards-universal-rules) you're always welcome here :D
